company.name: FashionHub
company.description: FashionHub is an e-commerce platform for modern apparel, accessories, and seasonal collections focused on style, value, and fast delivery.

products.name: Summer Breeze Floral Dress
products.description: Lightweight floral midi dress made from breathable cotton blend — perfect for summer outings.

products.name: Classic High-Waist Denim Shorts
products.description: High-rise denim shorts with a comfortable stretch fit and distressed finish.

products.name: Strappy Flat Sandals
products.description: Comfortable flat sandals with adjustable straps and cushioned footbed.

services.name: Personal Styling Advice
services.description: One-on-one styling suggestions delivered via chat. The AI stylist recommends outfits and product pairings based on user preferences.
services.how_to_use: Ask the chatbot about occasion, size, and preferred styles; AI returns tailored outfit suggestions and product links.

services.name: Gift Wrap & Personalized Note
services.description: Gift wrapping service with an option to add a personalized note at checkout.

services.name: Easy Returns & Exchange
services.description: 30-day returns and exchange policy on eligible items.
services.policy_summary: Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in original packaging. Returns processed within 5–7 business days after pickup or drop-off confirmation.

offers.title: Summer Launch Sale
offers.details: Up to 30% off on selected summer collection items.
offers.applicability: Selected SKUs only. Discount applied at checkout.

offers.title: Festive Combo Offer
offers.details: Buy 2 get 1 at 50% off on accessories.

offers.title: New Customer Welcome
offers.details: Flat 10% off on first purchase (max discount INR 500).
offers.applicability: Automatically applied for new registered customers.

payment_methods.refund_policy: Refunds processed within 7–10 business days to the original payment method. UPI and wallet refunds are usually faster (2–5 days).

tracking.notifications: SMS and email updates sent after dispatch.

customer_service.sla: Responses within 24 hours (email), immediate for chat support.

faq.question: Who are the investors in FashionHub?
faq.answer: FashionHub has celebrity investors including Deepika Padukone, Virat Kohli, Alia Bhatt, Ranveer Singh, and Kiara Advani, supporting sustainable and trendy fashion initiatives.

faq.question: How long does delivery take?
faq.answer: Standard delivery takes 3–7 days depending on location; express delivery options are available in select cities.

faq.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faq.answer: We accept UPI, cards, wallets, net banking, cash on delivery, and EMI options.

faq.question: Who are the founders of FashionHub?
faq.answer: FashionHub was founded by Harshal Khapekar, Disha Raut, Priya Koche, and Laxmi Bagde.

faq.question: What is the return policy?
faq.answer: We offer a 30-day return/exchange policy on eligible items. Items must be unused and in original packaging.

faq.question: When do the offers start?
faq.answer: The Summer Launch Sale starts on April 1, 2025, and the Festive Combo Offer begins on October 15, 2025.

faq.question: How can I track my order?
faq.answer: Once shipped, you’ll receive an SMS and email with tracking details from our delivery partners like BlueDart or Delhivery.

faq.question: Can I cancel my order?
faq.answer: Orders can be cancelled before they are shipped. Go to 'My Orders' and click 'Cancel'. If already shipped, you can refuse delivery.

faq.question: How do I apply a coupon code?
faq.answer: You can enter your coupon code at checkout before making the payment. The discount will be automatically applied if valid.

faq.question: Does FashionHub have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Yes, the FashionHub app is available for Android and iOS users. Download it from Google Play Store or Apple App Store.

faq.question: How do I create an account on FashionHub?
faq.answer: Click on the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage, enter your email or mobile number, and set a password to create your account.

faq.question: Do you offer student discounts?
faq.answer: Yes, verified students get 15% off on select collections. Verification required through your student email ID.

faq.question: Can I exchange a size after purchase?
faq.answer: Yes, you can request an exchange for a different size within 30 days if the item is in stock.

faq.question: What is the minimum order for free delivery?
faq.answer: Orders above ₹799 are eligible for free standard delivery. For smaller orders, a ₹49 shipping fee applies.

faq.question: Do you deliver internationally?
faq.answer: Yes, we ship to over 40 countries. Delivery usually takes 7–21 business days depending on customs clearance.

faq.question: How do I get updates on new collections?
faq.answer: Subscribe to our newsletter or follow us on Instagram and Facebook for new launches and exclusive previews.

faq.question: What should I do if I received a damaged product?
faq.answer: Please report it within 48 hours via our chatbot or email at support@fashionhub.example. We’ll arrange a replacement or refund.

faq.question: Do you have a loyalty or rewards program?
faq.answer: Yes, our FashionHub Rewards lets you earn points for every purchase. Points can be redeemed for discounts on future orders.

faq.question: Is my payment information secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. All payments are processed through secure, encrypted gateways compliant with PCI-DSS standards.

faq.question: Can I gift someone directly through FashionHub?
faq.answer: Yes, you can choose the gift wrap option at checkout and add a personalized note for your recipient.

faq.question: What if my refund hasn’t arrived?
faq.answer: Refunds take 7–10 business days to reflect. If delayed, please contact support with your order ID for assistance.

faq.question: Do you sell men’s fashion too?
faq.answer: Yes, our men’s collection includes shirts, t-shirts, jeans, footwear, and accessories.

faq.question: Does FashionHub offer cashbacks?
faq.answer: Yes, select UPI and wallet payments may offer instant cashback during promotional campaigns.

faq.question: What is FashionHub Wallet?
faq.answer: It’s your in-app digital wallet where you can store refunds, cashback, and make instant payments for future purchases.

faq.question: Can I talk to a real stylist?
faq.answer: Yes, human stylists are available Monday to Friday between 10 AM and 6 PM IST for premium users.

faq.question: Do you provide eco-friendly packaging?
faq.answer: Yes, 70% of our packaging is recyclable and we are moving towards 100% sustainable materials by 2026.

metadata.usage_instructions: Use this JSON as your chatbot knowledge base for FashionHub. The chatbot should fetch contextually relevant data when users ask about products, delivery, offers, payments, or investors.
metadata.source_notes: Fictional celebrity investment data for demo use only.
